TextView.android:text: This app was developed to assist individuals with malfunctioning loudspeakers on their devices. It serves as a media player that bypasses the typical speaker channels, allowing users to listen to media content via alternative audio pathways.

The inspiration behind this app came from the need to provide a solution for my cousin, whose phone's loudspeaker was not functioning properly. By developing this app, I aimed to offer a practical and accessible tool for individuals facing similar challenges.
Thank you for using this app. Your support and feedback are greatly appreciated.
